title: Analyzing the Interconnected Dynamics of Domestic Biofuel Burning: Unraveling VOC Emissions, Surface-Ozone Formation, Diagnostic Ratios, and Source Identification
content:

Burning domestic biofuels is a prevalent and cost-effective method of energy production, primarily for household activities. This process is a leading contributor to the emission of non-methane volatile organic compounds...
